environment_variables.FLUXIONPath: Path to directory containing the FLUXION executable script.
environment_variables.FLUXIONLibPath: Path to directory containing the FLUXION library (scripts).
environment_variables.FLUXIONWorkspacePath: Path to the temp. directory available to FLUXION & subscripts.
environment_variables.FLUXIONIPTablesBackup: Path to FLUXION's iptables backup file.
environment_variables.FLUXIONPreferencesFile: Path to FLUXION's preferences file, to be loaded afterward.
environment_variables.FLUXIONNoiseFloor: Constant denoting the reference noise floor level.
environment_variables.FLUXIONNoiseCeiling: Constant denoting the reference noise ceiling level.
environment_variables.FLUXIONWindowRatio: Window ratio for the visualizer (bigger = smaller windows).
environment_variables.FLUXIONSkipDependencies: Flag to allow skipping dependency checks.
environment_variables.FLUXIONMissingDependencies: Flag indicating if any dependencies are missing.
environment_variables.FLUXIONAuto: Flag indicating whether fluxion is running in auto mode.
environment_variables.FLUXIONDebug: Flag indicating whether fluxion is running in debug mode.
environment_variables.FLUXIONAirmonNG: Flag indicating whether to use airmon-ng for interface management.
environment_variables.FLUXIONWIKillProcesses: Flag indicating whether to kill potentially conflicting processes.
environment_variables.FLUXIONWIReloadDriver: Flag indicating whether to reload the wireless driver.
environment_variables.FLUXIONOutputDevice: The output device for fluxion (either /dev/null for normal mode or /tmp/fluxion_debug_log for debug mode).
environment_variables.FLUXIONHoldXterm: Hold xterm open for debugging purposes.
environment_variables.FLUXIONVLineDefault: The default vertical line for fluxion.
environment_variables.PackageManagerLog: The log file for the package manager.
environment_variables.FluxionTargetMAC: The MAC address of the target access point.
environment_variables.FluxionTargetSSID: The SSID of the target access point.
environment_variables.FluxionTargetChannel: The channel of the target access point.
environment_variables.FluxionTargetSSIDClean: The sanitized SSID of the target access point.
environment_variables.FluxionTargetRogueMAC: The MAC address of the rogue access point.
environment_variables.FluxionTargetEncryption: The encryption type of the target access point.
environment_variables.FluxionTargetMakerID: The maker ID of the target access point.
environment_variables.FluxionTargetMaker: The maker of the target access point.
environment_variables.FluxionInterfaceSelectedState: The state of the selected interface.
environment_variables.FluxionInterfaceSelectedInfo: The info of the selected interface.
environment_variables.FluxionHashPath: The path to the handshake file.
environment_variables.FluxionDone: The last executed command in a sequence.
environment_variables.FluxionTargetTrackerInterface: The interface used for target tracking.
environment_variables.FluxionTargetTrackerDaemonPID: The PID of the target tracker daemon.
environment_variables.SCREEN_SIZE: The screen size of the terminal.
environment_variables.NEW_SCREEN_SIZE_X: The new width of the terminal after applying the window ratio.
environment_variables.NEW_SCREEN_SIZE_Y: The new height of the terminal after applying the window ratio.
environment_variables.NEW_SCREEN_SIZE_BIG_X: The new width of the big window.
environment_variables.NEW_SCREEN_SIZE_BIG_Y: The new height of the big window.
environment_variables.SCREEN_SIZE_MID_X: The middle x coordinate of the terminal.
environment_variables.SCREEN_SIZE_MID_Y: The middle y coordinate of the terminal.
environment_variables.TOPLEFT: The geometry of the top left window.
environment_variables.TOPRIGHT: The geometry of the top right window.
environment_variables.TOP: The geometry of the top middle window.
environment_variables.BOTTOMLEFT: The geometry of the bottom left window.
environment_variables.BOTTOMRIGHT: The geometry of the bottom right window.
environment_variables.BOTTOM: The geometry of the bottom middle window.
environment_variables.LEFT: The geometry of the left middle window.
environment_variables.RIGHT: The geometry of the right middle window.
environment_variables.TOPLEFTBIG: The geometry of the big top left window.
environment_variables.TOPRIGHTBIG: The geometry of the big top right window.
environment_variables.verticalBorder: The vertical border format for the header.
environment_variables.headerTextFormat: The format for the header text.
environment_variables.choice: The user's choice from a query.
environment_variables.targetInfo: The target info from the tracker.
environment_variables.targetChannel: The channel of the target from the tracker.
environment_variables.candidateAPInfo: The candidate access point info from the scanner.
environment_variables.candidatesMAC: An array of MAC addresses of the candidates.
environment_variables.candidatesClientsCount: An array of the number of clients connected to the candidates.
environment_variables.candidatesChannel: An array of the channels of the candidates.
environment_variables.candidatesSecurity: An array of the security types of the candidates.
environment_variables.candidatesPower: An array of the power levels of the candidates.
environment_variables.candidatesColor: An array of the colors of the candidates.
environment_variables.candidatesQuality: An array of the qualities of the candidates.
environment_variables.candidatesESSID: An array of the ESSIDs of the candidates.
environment_variables.colorlessFormat: The colorless format for target info.
environment_variables.colorfullFormat: The colorfull format for target info.
environment_variables.monitorTimeout: The timeout for the target tracker.
environment_variables.capturePath: The path to the capture files.
environment_variables.interfacesAvailableInfo: An array of the info of the available interfaces.
environment_variables.interfacesAvailableColor: An array of the colors of the available interfaces.
environment_variables.interfacesAvailableState: An array of the states of the available interfaces.
environment_variables.skipOption: The skip option for interface selection.
environment_variables.descriptions: An array of descriptions of the attacks.
environment_variables.identifiers: An array of identifiers of the attacks.
environment_variables.hashPath: The path to the handshake file.
environment_variables.hashBSSID: The BSSID of the handshake file.
environment_variables.hashESSID: The ESSID of the handshake file.
environment_variables.hashChannel: The channel of the handshake file.
environment_variables.hashEncryption: The encryption type of the handshake file.
environment_variables.hashMaker: The maker of the handshake file.
environment_variables.hashResult: The result of the hash verification.
environment_variables.path: The path to the attack script.
environment_variables.attackWasSet: Flag indicating whether an attack was set.
environment_variables.selectedInterface: The selected interface from the interface query.
environment_variables.sequence: The sequence of commands to execute in the main loop.
